questions.text: How clearly do you understand the concepts presented in this tutorial?
How excited are you to continue learning about the Decentralized Web?

thankYouMessage.title: Thank you!
thankYouMessage.text-complete:
Your feedback is very much appreciated!
Would you like to help us out a bit more?

  If you want, you can fill up this quick survey to helps us improve our content.
